protein.specific_function: Converts progesterone to its inactive form, 20-alpha-dihydroxyprogesterone (20-alpha-OHP). In the liver and intestine, may have a role in the transport of bile. May have a role in monitoring the intrahepatic bile acid concentration. Has a low bile-binding ability. May play a role in myelin formation.

pathway.name: Metabolism of xenobiotics by cytochrome P450

go_class.description: oxidoreductase activity, acting on NADH or NADPH, quinone or similar compound as acceptor
bile acid and bile salt transport
cellular response to jasmonic acid stimulus
